name: 8bit Invasion
description:
This game has everything that the old games of Martians had, It's possible to play alone or with someone on the same computer. You start with 3 lives per ship and the easiest level, once you complete one level, you go foward to the next level, with increased difficulty at each level.

What to expect:

-Possibility of playing alone or local coop

-A lot of levels with increased difficulty

-Good retro graphics respecting the past games.

-Scores for each player


How to play:

-S to join player 1

-K to join player 2

-A and D to move left and right ( player 1)

-J and L to move left and right ( player 2 )
